name: twisted rib hat
notes:
this crochet hat with folded over brim features a distinctive, knit-like texture achieved through special, but easy crochet stitches, providing both elasticity and warmth.

the hat is worked flat in turned rows from side to side (from the brim to the crown), with a pattern repeat of 4 rows that is easy to memorize.
